subject: Code Posting: RandomTestSuite
msgSnippet: Hi all, At Model N we ve made a lot of extensions to JUnit.  Over the next few weeks I m going to posting several of them for the benefit of anyone else who
messageBody:
Hi all,

At Model N we've made a lot of extensions to JUnit. Over the next
few weeks I'm going to posting several of them for the benefit of
anyone else who wants to use them. I would love to hear any feedback
you have to give.

Starting with something extremely simple: here's a way to run all
the tests in your suite in random order.

Why would you want to do this? For one, it helps ensure that no
tests are making assumptions about the order they're run in. Also,
using RandomTestSuites inside ActiveTestSuites can help identify race
conditions that might not have come up otherwise. (And maybe we just
*like* running them randomly, okay?!)

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/files/RandomTestSuite.java

Enjoy,
Kevin
